#bitcoin-core-dev Meeting: abubakarsadiq achow101 _aj_ ajonas b10c brunoerg cfields darosior dergoegge dzxzg eugenesiegel fanquake fjahr furszy gleb glozow hebasto hodlinator instagibbs janb84 jarolrod jonatack josibake kanzure kevkevin laanwj LarryRuane lightlike l0rinc luke-jr maflcko marcofleon maxedw Murch pinheadmz provoostenator ryanofsky sdaftuar S3RK stickies-v sipa sliv3r__ sr_gi tdb3 theStack TheCharlatan vasild
willcl-ark

There are no pre-proposed meeting topics this week. Any last minute ones to add?
hi
hi
hi
hi

hi
Ok, starting with the WGs, in reverse order for a change ;)
#topic Net Split WG Update (cfields)
Attention has been elsewhere, no update this week.
#topic Silent Payments WG Update (Novo)
Not a lot has changed
I have a few ideas to try, real-or-random mentioned trying out parallelisation
I want to see what I can achieve with this
I have a LabelSet bitcoin-core implementation branch and some testing shows that it is slightlity faster than the Bip approach at scanning real mainnet blocks
But this testing was done with only two labels, I haven't done testing with higher labels, but I'm pretty sure the slight difference will disappear with a few more labels
hi
I've got nothing else to share
Thanks Novo!
#topic Benchmarking WG Update (l0rinc, andrewtoth)
willcl-ark added some more benchmarks via benchcoin in #31132. Got some good review on the split off PRs.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/31132 | validation: fetch block inputs on parallel threads 3x faster IBD by andrewtoth · Pull Request #31132 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
l0rinc mentioned he will be here later, so maybe he has more to add. #32407 and #34253 were merged.
help
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/32407 | . by AlnetharyT · Pull Request #32407 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/34253 | validation: cache tip recency for lock-free `IsInitialBlockDownload()` by l0rinc · Pull Request #34253 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
pinheadmz: how can I help?
hi
ugh you can remind me to click on the right temrinal before typing
will do
that's it from me unless l0rinc has more
I will add a few stuff later, let's continue
#topic Kernel WG Update (sedited)
alexanderwiederin opened a draft RFC for a new CChain data structure: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34424
stickies-v is making progress on the logging PR: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34374
we also integrated header processing in some of the kernel library language wrappers
that's all.
#topic Fuzzing WG Update (dergoegge)
nothing from my side
#topic Cluster Mempool WG Update (sdaftuar, sipa)
Not many updates. I'm working on the cost model PR (#34138), but focus remains the deterministic ordering: #34257
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/34138 | Cluster mempool: more accurate cost model for SFL by sipa · Pull Request #34138 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/34257 | txgraph: deterministic optimal transaction order by sipa · Pull Request #34257 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
That's it for me.
Anything else to discuss?
PSA: next asmap built happens again in one week: https://github.com/asmap/asmap-data/issues/42
Also the v31 feature freeze is 4 weeks out afaict, not sure if there is something to discuss right now though
Let me give a quick update
#34253 was merged, we don't expect the change to be measurable but it simplifies the call sites and helps with follow-ups like #34054
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/34253 | validation: cache tip recency for lock-free `IsInitialBlockDownload()` by l0rinc · Pull Request #34253 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/34054 | net processing: Add ibd check before processing block for txdownloadman by sedited · Pull Request #34054 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
#34207 was also merged, this has been in review in various forms for at least a year now - this leads naturally to the next steps in #34280, e.g. #33018
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/34207 | coins/refactor: enforce `GetCoin()` returns only unspent coins by l0rinc · Pull Request #34207 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/34280 | Coins Cache Cleanup checklist · Issue #34280 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/33018 | coins: remove SetFresh method from CCoinsCacheEntry by andrewtoth · Pull Request #33018 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
I've measured the script restoration benchmark on most of my machines and sent it to Julian, he's updated the plots with the new data.
that's it from me
Thanks l0rinc! Anything else?
no, thanks
I meant if anyone else has a topic :)
I know, but still nothing from me :D
hi
fastest meeting ever, thanks fjahr!
kewl
#endmeeting
